name: RN apps: Large GIFs are not rendered

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)

inline.description:
RN apps: Large GIFs are not rendered
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Post the following on the web app
    (ensure links previews are enabled in Account Settings)
    https://i.redd.it/ut25p64zbte21.gif

  2. View the channel where the URL was posted on RN
inline.expectedResult: • Only the URL is shown in the post and the GIF is not previewed

customFields.Important notes about this step: You can find test files here: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1xGCy3tp9A_WxOfdgAzBHzrqJ1WCyfSjW
